modules.description: Provides functions to parse, format, and manipulate numerical values with localized representations, including date and number formatting. Works with strings, integers, and floating-point numbers, leveraging the numeral.js library's capabilities. Enables precise control over currency formatting, date localization, and number scaling in web applications.

Provides methods to construct and manipulate numeric values, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division with mutable and non-mutable variants. Works with wrapped numeric types such as integers, floats, and strings, returning float options or formatted strings. Used to perform precise arithmetic operations on mixed input types and generate human-readable representations.
